summary: A writer returns home from World War I. He has developed a very bad case of post traumatic stress disorder. He contemplates suicide, but becomes interested in the 12 year old niece of the innkeeper at the place where he is recuperating.
cast: Pierre Clémenti|Katya Berger|Ugo Bologna|Michele Soavi|Raf Baldassarre|José Luis López Vázquez|Bárbara Rey|Tom Felleghy|Cesare Di Vito|Walter Colombaioni|Eros Buttaglieri|Paul Muller|Maria Monti
title: Historia de Eva
